startpage.title: Startpage
startpage.header: Random generator for simple math worksheets
startpage.introtext: Using this website you can generate simple basic arithmetic worksheets and print them out. The created calculations are generated using PHPs random function.

addition.introtext: Create a worksheet with 45 additions, where the result lies between 10 and 100.

subtraction.introtext: Create a worksheet with 45 subtractions, where the result lies between 10 and 100.

multiplication.introtext: Create a worksheet with 45 multiplications, where the 1. and 2. factor lie between 1 and 10.

division.introtext: Create a worksheet with 45 divisions. They are the opposite of the multiplicatioins.

mixedequal.title: Mixed 1
mixedequal.introtext: Creates a mixed calculation sheet. The distribution of the 4 basic operations is done equally.

faq.title: Help
faq.introtext: This page contains informations about the functionality of the Worksheet-Generator as well as other interesting facts.

one.question: What is the Worksheet-Generator?
one.answer: The Worksheet Generator is a website, which helps to create worksheets for the 4 basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division). The output of the worksheet is optimized for print. Therefor the Worksheet-Generator represents a tool for parents to help create worksheets for their children.

two.question: How does the Worksheet-Generator work?
two.answer:
The Worksheet-Generator uses a random function to create all calculations. The sourrounding conditions for the predefined worksheets contained in the startpage where already set, in order to create meaningfull worksheets for elementary school pupils.
There is a Generator planned for the future, by which the user may choose the desired arithmetic operations as well as the according conditions.

three.question: Why are there 45 calculations in the predefined worksheets?
three.answer: I figured that the ideal way of outputting the calculations was a 3 column layout. 2 columns left too much whitespace, 4 columns were to dense. Also adding 15 calculcations per column resulted in a total of 45.

four.question: How did I get the idea for this application?
four.answer: My older daugther attends the 3rd class of elementary school. She once approached me and asked if I could write down some calculations for her to practice. While writing down some additions and subtractions, I came about the idea of programming a website, which uses a random generator to create these calculations. So that I would have less work to do ;-)

five.question: How can I report a bug, express criticism or propose a feature?
five.answer: I am very happy about each single request, no matter the nature of the message (praise, criticism or suggestion). Just write an email to klaus@webzeug.net. I will try to respond as quickly as possible. Thank you very much.
